name: Motion Replica
description:
Motion Replica was created for the GameDevJs Game Jam in only 10 days!

This game is a puzzle game inspired by my game still in development 'Enigma' 

The game is similar but in Motion Replica every move you make is mirrored on the other side

Controls

KeyboardGame PadMoveWASD or Arrow KeysD-Pad
PauseESC or P'start'Restart'R''select'

Play now!
